Reviews.Content: Excellent Hotel in Berlin Stayed here during a business trip and found the hotel to be excellent and worth the 4 Star rating.Check in Staff were professional and helpfulRooms were nicely apointed and comfortableBreakfast was excellent.Dinner in the hotel was average (for the price) and would eat somewhere else next timeDefinitely would stay here again.Proximity to the S-Bahn is about a 10 minute walk.
Reviews.Author: germanfan
